oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gardner, E.S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Found the deed which transferred the lot to Martin C. Cotton. Check Martin C. Cotton's card.; 4; 2; 10.0x40.0; 261; I; 03/29/1844; This lot is located in Section #4 Lot #2 according to the description in the deed-- located next to Robert Gardner's Lot-- but now is absorbed in Martin C. Cotton's lot/
